H0.text: Who became BBC Radio One Breakfast Show presenter in June 1973. Terry Wogan

H1.text: Who became BBC Radio One Breakfast Show presenter in June 1973. Jimmy Savile

H2.text: Who became BBC Radio One Breakfast Show presenter in June 1973. Kenny Everett

H3.text: Who became BBC Radio One Breakfast Show presenter in June 1973. Noel Edmond

A4.text: Edmonds was promoted to host The Radio 1 Breakfast Show from Monday 4 June 1973 to Friday 28 April 1978, taking over from Tony Blackburn.
